keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here
unmapAll
map n scrollDown
map N scrollPageDown
map p scrollUp
map P scrollPageUp
map f scrollRight
map b scrollLeft
map <a-f> goForward
map <a-b> goBack
map / enterFindMode
map . performFind
map , performBackwardsFind
map t createTab
map F nextTab
map B previousTab
map o visitPreviousTab
map s LinkHints.activateMode
map S LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map w LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
